appDescription.message: Open videos from youtube and vimeo on a floating window

titleOnAction.description: Title for pageAction and context menu title

noServerError.message:
Companion app is not running or maybe it's not installed.. 

 Install companion app?
noServerError.description: Error for when extension doesn't find local server

urlNotSupportedError.description: Error for when url in selected text(Context menu) is not supported

mediaProviderNotSupportedError.description: Error for when media provider(eg: youtube) is not supported by application
